alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND NORTHEASTERN DANE COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poynette, or 9 miles east of Lake Wisconsin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Poynette, Arlington, and East Bristol. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 118 and 119. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 106 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
